QuestData.Title: All Hail Roanauk!
QuestData.Description: Like the tauren, Forsaken, trolls and blood elves, so too do the taunka need a leader born of their own blood. The one you saved from Icemist, Roanauk, will be this leader.$B$B<Overlord Agmar hands you a parchment.>$B$BI give to you something familiar - the blood oath of the Horde.$B$BTake the oath to Roanauk Icemist and initiate him into the Horde as leader of the taunka.$B$BLet us not keep him waiting.$B$B<Agmar nods.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Roanauk Icemist at Agmar's Hammer and initiate him as a member and leader of the Horde forces.$B$BReturn to Overlord Agmar with the Blood Oath of the Horde when you complete this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do not waste time, $n. Angrathar awaits!
QuestData.RewardText: With the aid of such a powerful shaman, we are sure to be victorious at the Wrathgate!
